Template filters¶

We have some template filters to make text to be valid for pdf generating in LaTeX.

udata.templatetags.syns.texify(value=None)¶

This is a filter for make given text to be valid for latex

Parameters:value (str or unicode) – a given text
Returns:a tex-formated string or empty string
Return type:str or unicode
udata.templatetags.syns.fdate(inst)¶
Parameters:inst (udata.models.Work or udata.models.Study) – an instance of work or study
Returns:a formated string of years diapason for be included in tex
Return type:str
